info.abstract:
[Type] Metadata access.
[Behaviour] Set parameters in a workflow environment.
[Parameters] - key : name of the parameter. It should comply with IEEE Std 1003.1-2001 conventions, unless brackets {} are adopted to refer it. - value : value of the parameter. By default it will se to 1. It can be accessed with @key or @{key}. - subset_filter : set to "yes" in case "value" is an index array and subset string has to be stored on behalf of the list of numbers. Only arrays of integers are considered. - id : workflow identifier. By default the hosting workflow is selected. The target workflow must have been submitted in the same session.
[Examples] Set the parameter "var" to 10: OPH_TERM: oph_set key=var;value=10; SUBMISSION STRING: "operator=oph_set;key=var;value=10;"
